attributes.action: Keep youth sporting activities open supporting mental health during tough times
attributes.additional_details: Because the youth need support during this tough time and sport and leisure is an escape from the harsh reality
attributes.background: Want you to recognise how sport and leisure impacts the youths lives and changes their lives for good and supports their mental health which is key

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557497
